mapper.select: SELECT a.CO_CD, a.DIV_CD, a.FR_DT, a.DEAL_DD, a.DEAL_PD, a.CASH_AM, a.TO_DT FROM AcashFix a WHERE a.CO_CD = #{CO_CD} AND a.DIV_CD = #{DIV_CD} AND a.DISP_SQ = #{DISP_SQ} AND ( (a.FR_DT BETWEEN CONCAT(#{inputYear} - 4, '0101') AND CONCAT(#{inputYear}, '1231')) OR (a.TO_DT BETWEEN CONCAT(#{inputYear} - 4, '0101') AND CONCAT(#{inputYear}, '1231')) OR (a.FR_DT < CONCAT(#{inputYear} - 4, '0101') AND a.TO_DT >= CONCAT(#{inputYear}, '1231')) )
